item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Design data intensive application chapter 1 Notes
item.description: What my thought on hugo, looks like its not that simple that it sound. It has its own learning curve. I tried different theme and but few themes are not working out of the box.
